name: Magnetic (Rising Retro)
description:
Use a plastic(?) magnet to remove plastic from our seas and clean it.

How to play:

  • Use left and right arrow keys to move the ship.
  • Use up and down arrow keys to move the magnet.
  • Hold spacebar to "turn on" the magnet and bring it close to plastic to attract it. Take plastic out of water and gain points. 
  • Pick as much plastic as possible in 1 minute.

Credits:

  • Sprites: most taken form opengameart.org and some made by me.
  • Music: taken from opengameart.org.
  • Tools used: Godot game engine.

I made this game in 24 hours for seajam by polymars.

#SEAJAM
